Class LowestValueAI

java.lang.Object
Player
LowestValueAI
All Implemented Interfaces:
AIBot, Serializable
public class LowestValueAI extends Player implements AIBot
This is the LowestValueAI class within the UNO game which represents an AI bot player on the UNO game.
